name: Love Verne
description:
LUDUM DARE 46 Jam game.

Super Buggy, Kind of Fun!

FERNando the FERN has a pet VERNE!

Float around and learn a bit about Fernando's pad, Verne's breakup with [PERSON], and feed Verne things.

 Try and keep him alive everytime his heart stops.  Miss the beats and Fernando will cause his pet MORE HARM than good.

VERNE is finicky and will only eat things while standing still. He likes his food blended, or really hot! He tends to do a weird Ska dance when he panicks, to let Fernando he needs emergency help! 

Requires ARROW keys and a MOUSE to play.

Basic text menu for title and game-over states.

PRES [ESC] at anytime to return to the title or start over. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------

SPOILER LINES:

The Chicken, Hot Soup, Goldfish Smoothie.

  • Feed him chicken while standing still.
  • Turn on the oven(left black buttons on stove), wait for the pot to steam, and then feed it to Verne
  • Put goldfish in blender, turn on blender, bring cup to blender, feed to

No Catfishing.

  •  Currently if you make a "fish + cat" it won't trigger the event AND it will lock the player out of random panic attacks, and you will be left with nothing to do. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------

72 Hours and a the one extra after. For Ludum Dare 46

IMy focus was on getting the humor, art, and play to feel cohesive  and a bit surreal. Let me know if I hit the marks!

Enjoy.
